gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `IntangibleAssets` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `IntangibleAssets` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `IntangibleAssetsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice` MUST NOT be reported, because `IntangibleAssetsCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsCostPrice` MUST NOT be reported, because `IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistenceCovPU1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_IntangibleAssets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_IntangibleAssets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` reported with `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and `DevelopmentCostsMember` MUST be equal to `DevelopmentCosts` without `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and DevelopmentCostsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` reported with `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and `GoodwillMember` MUST be equal to `Goodwill` without `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and GoodwillMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` reported with `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and `IntangibleAssetsMember` MUST be equal to `IntangibleAssets` without `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and IntangibleAssetsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` reported with `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and `IntangibleAssetsOtherMember` MUST be equal to `IntangibleAssetsOther` without `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and IntangibleAssetsOtherMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` reported with `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and `PatentsTrademarksOtherRightsMember` MUST be equal to `PatentsTrademarksOtherRights` without `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and PatentsTrademarksOtherRightsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit6_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` reported with `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and `PrepaymentsIntangibleAssetsMember` MUST be equal to `PrepaymentsIntangibleAssets` without `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` and PrepaymentsIntangibleAssetsMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedIntangibleAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
